<source lang="xml">
<settings>
<redraw>1</redraw>
<data_type>csv</data_type>
<pie>
	<radius>$radius$</radius>
	<inner_radius>0</inner_radius>
	<angle>45</angle>
	<height>20</height>
	<gradient>radial</gradient>
	<gradient_ratio>40,-20</gradient_ratio>
</pie>
<animation>
	$if(growTime)$
	<start_time>$growTime$</start_time>
	$endif$
	<start_effect>strong</start_effect>
	<pull_out_time>1</pull_out_time>
</animation>
<data_labels>
	<radius>20</radius>
	<text_color>#000000</text_color>
	<text_size>11</text_size>
	<show><![CDATA[<b>{title}</b>]]></show>
	<show_lines>true</show_lines>
</data_labels>
<balloon>
	<color>#ffffff</color>
	<text_color>#000000</text_color>
	<border_width>2</border_width>
	<border_color>#000000</border_color>
</balloon>
<legend>
	<enabled>$showLegend$</enabled>
	<border_alpha>20</border_alpha>
	<margins>5</margins>
</legend>
<labels>

	<label>
		<x>0</x><y>30</y>
		<align>center</align>
		<text_size>15</text_size>
		<text><![CDATA[<b>$title$</b>]]></text>
	</label>

</labels>
</settings>
</source>
